ReferenceData.String: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1"?> <!DOCTYPE ForceField.dtd PUBLIC "ForceField.dtd" "ForceField.dtd"> <ForceField> <AtomTypes> <Type name="h_1" class="h_b" element="H" mass="1.0079"/> <Type name="f_1" class="f_b" element="F" mass="18.9984"/> <Type name="cl_1" class="cl_b" element="Cl" mass="35.453"/> <Type name="br_1" class="br_b" element="Br" mass="79.904"/> <Type name="i_1" class="i_b" element="I" mass="126.904"/> </AtomTypes> <Residues> <Residue name="fluorane"> <Atom name="H_1" type="h_1" charge="0.13034"/> <Atom name="F_2" type="f_1" charge="-0.13034"/> <Bond atomName1="H_1" atomName2="F_2"/> </Residue> <Residue name="chlorane"> <Atom name="H_1" type="h_1" charge="0.12066"/> <Atom name="Cl_2" type="cl_1" charge="-0.12066"/> <Bond atomName1="H_1" atomName2="Cl_2"/> </Residue> <Residue name="bromane"> <Atom name="H_1" type="h_1" charge="0.116783"/> <Atom name="Br_2" type="br_1" charge="-0.116783"/> <Bond atomName1="H_1" atomName2="Br_2"/> </Residue> <Residue name="iodane"> <Atom name="H_1" type="h_1" charge="0.113285"/> <Atom name="I_2" type="i_1" charge="-0.113285"/> <Bond atomName1="H_1" atomName2="I_2"/> </Residue> </Residues> <HarmonicBondForce> <Bond class1="f_b" class2="h_b" k="300000" length="0.0924"/> <Bond class1="cl_b" class2="h_b" k="289056" length="0.1283"/> <Bond class1="br_b" class2="h_b" k="300000" length="0.1424"/> <Bond class1="h_b" class2="i_b" k="300000" length="0.1621"/> </HarmonicBondForce> <HarmonicAngleForce energy="0"/> <CustomAngleForce energy="0"/> <PeriodicTorsionForce energy="0"/> <PeriodicTorsionForce energy="0"/> <CustomNonbondedForce energy="0" bondCutoff="3"> <GlobalParameter name="PotentialFunction" defaultValue="LJ12_6"/> <UseAttributeFromResidue name="charge"/> <PerParticleParameter name="sigma"/> <PerParticleParameter name="epsilon"/> <PerParticleParameter name="charge"/> <PerParticleParameter name="zeta"/> <Atom type="br_1" sigma="0.375" epsilon="1.05" zeta="12"/> <Atom type="cl_1" sigma="0.375" epsilon="1.05" zeta="13"/> <Atom type="f_1" sigma="0.275" epsilon="0.4" zeta="13"/> <Atom type="h_1" sigma="0.005" epsilon="0.065" zeta="13"/> <Atom type="i_1" sigma="0.275" epsilon="2.1" zeta="12"/> </CustomNonbondedForce> <NonbondedForce coulomb14scale="1" lj14scale="1" energy="0" bondCutoff="3"> <UseAttributeFromResidue name="charge"/> <Atom type="br_1" sigma="0.375" epsilon="1.05"/> <Atom type="cl_1" sigma="0.375" epsilon="1.05"/> <Atom type="f_1" sigma="0.275" epsilon="0.4"/> <Atom type="h_1" sigma="0.005" epsilon="0.065"/> <Atom type="i_1" sigma="0.275" epsilon="2.1"/> </NonbondedForce> </ForceField>
